alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:16AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN RAPIDES...BEAUREGARD... EASTERN VERNON...NORTHWESTERN ALLEN PARISHES IN SOUTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND WEST CENTRAL NEWTON COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM CDT... At 216 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Montgomery to 6 miles east of Slagle to near Singer to Old Salem. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, De Ridder, Rosepine, Boyce, Elizabeth, Dry Creek, Singer, Sugartown, De Quincy, Hineston, Lena, Fort Johnson, Fields, Pitkin, Mittie, Grant, Colfax, Bivens, Hutton, and Flatwoods. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 93 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Rapides; Vernon
